about_the_game:
Abstract Driver is a 1-person game where you have to move inside a cylindrical space.
This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to control the camera to the rhythmic music and score points. If you collect a certain number of points, you get achievements.

SYNTHWAVE:
Move to the pleasant sounds of synthwave along the endless tube

OBSTACLES:
Circumnavigate obstacles that meet on your way. A collision with an obstacle will end your path.

MODES:
Change game modes with the number keys on your keyboard. You can speed up, slow down, change the type of space.

GAME FEATURES:
  • Different types of obstacles
  • Variety of game modes
  • Speedy action movement for reaction
  • Stunning soundtrack
